prompt: Under an expansive, swirling sky, a solitary figure stands at the center of a desolate plain, their silhouette stark against the churning mass of cumulonimbus clouds. The scene unfolds in a vast open field, where the grass bends violently under the assault of an approaching tempest. From a high vantage point, the camera captures the figure's struggle against the fierce wind, the fabric of their billowing coat flapping wildly. The clouds tower above, a seething mass of dark grays and purples, illuminated sporadically by the furious dance of lightning that streaks across the sky. In the distance, the land stretches out seemingly infinite, interrupted only by the occasional flash of light that casts fleeting, sharp shadows on the ground. The dying light of the sun, partially obscured by cloud cover, casts an eerie, otherworldly glow, transitioning from dark amber to a deep indigo as the storm closes in. This dramatic play of light and shadow adds a layer of intensity to the scene, contrasting the deep moody blues and somber purples with the occasional warm glow. The atmosphere is tense, the air thick with electricity, creating a palpable sense of awe and foreboding. This moment, captured in high-resolution detail, evokes the raw power of nature with a cinematic, almost surreal quality reminiscent of epic film sequences in the style of classic storm-chasing documentaries. Every element—the boiling sky, the windswept field, the resolute figure—contributes to a scene that is as compelling as it is beautiful, a testament to both human resolve and the indomitable spirit of the natural world.

description: A solitary figure stands at the center of a desolate plain.
The scene features a swirling mass of cumulonimbus clouds.
Lightning streaks sporadically illuminate the dark sky.
questions: Is there a figure standing on the plain?
Do the clouds appear to be cumulonimbus?
Is lightning visible in the scene?

description: The figure is positioned centrally in the frame.
The camera is set at a high vantage point.
The horizon stretches far into the distance, uninterrupted.
questions: Is the figure centered in the frame?
Is the viewpoint from a high angle?
Does the horizon extend far into the distance?

description: The lighting transitions from dark amber to deep indigo.
The atmosphere is tense, with a palpable sense of awe.
The scene features cinematic, surreal qualities reminiscent of storm documentaries.
questions: Does the lighting change from amber to indigo?
